<style>
  /* All styles scoped under #ty-page to avoid collisions with Quarto/theme */
  #ty-page .ty-actions{display:flex;gap:.75rem;justify-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap;margin-bottom:1.25rem}

<script>
  (function(){
    var target = "https://www.datascienceyapper.com/";

      if (secs <= 0){ clearInterval(timer); window.location.href = target; }
    }, 1000);
    document.getElementById('ty-skip')?.addEventListener('click', function(){
      clearInterval(timer); window.location.href = target;
    });
  })();
</script>
